title: New: Pumarosa – Cecile
content:
Oh boy.

Been waiting for what feels like an eternity for this – the second offering from London five piece Pumarosa. The follow-up to 2015’s hugely ambitious debut single, Priestess, new track Cecile is equally as innovative, opening with a riff not a million miles from Scott Walker’s Jackie, Isabel Munoz-Newsome’s opulent vocals dominate and enslave the track. Don’t sleep on this. Check it out below.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
